alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 330 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Royal Palm Beach, or near Wellington, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Royal Palm Beach, Haverhill, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates, Golden Lakes, Loxahatchee Groves, The Acreage, Plantation Mobile Home Park, Stacey Street, Century Village and Cypress Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
